author: wn.com
title: New Testimony Clips Added to IWitness Watch Page (USC Shoah Foundation)
text: ( Source : USC Shoah Foundation ) Forty-eight testimony clips have been added to the popular ' Watch ' page on IWitness. The clips are derived from the latest projects and activities produced by USC Shoah Foundation and IWitness. The clips
